bug.author: cliveseldon
bug.summary: Central Dashboard UI Cutoff in Firefox
bug.description:
Kubeflow: v0.5.0 Firefox: 66.0.2 (64-bit) on Linux Mint <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/10563075/56852392-f313ce00-6912-11e9-94d0-9453a001bce9.png></denchmark-link>
Anyone else?

comments.comment: Issue-Label Bot is automatically applying the label kind/bug to this issue, with a confidence of 0.80. Please mark this comment with üëç or üëé to give our bot feedback! Links: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/marketplace/issue-label-bot>app homepage</denchmark-link> , <denchmark-link:https://mlbot.net/data/kubeflow/kubeflow>dashboard</denchmark-link> and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/hamelsmu/MLapp>code</denchmark-link> for this bot.

The same problem exists with Kubeflow v0.5.0 and Firefox Quantum 66.0.3 (64-Bit) on macOS Mojave 10.14.4: <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4034494/56855770-49056780-694d-11e9-9182-49b68f2e5ad8.png></denchmark-link>
